headline: Aurigo Software Expands Autodesk Integration to Offer Integrated Capital Planning to Facility Owner-Operators
summary: Aurigo Primus is an AI-powered capital portfolio and planning solution that helps facility owners and operators prioritize projects, evaluate investment tradeoffs, track real-time data, and optimize ROI across complex, multiyear programs. By integrating with Autodesk Construction Cloud, it bridges the gap between strategic planning and execution—connecting early decisions with downstream budgeting and contracts.
